info.name: PekoWalk Progress Bar
info.description:
Annoucement peko!!! This little war criminal want you for Peko army. Install this theme to see the progress of the training session. Let's conquer the world peko~

You can also join the Peko army at @usadapekora
But don't let her distract you from the fact that Pekora bought a FAQing monkey!!
info.additionalInfo:
Art by Kay Yu
Twitter: @kaynimatic

Since there's no update from "jeffboys123", so I recreate the progress bar
